details: Responsible for software development, system validation, and executing project plans across multiple customer products, including accounting, construction workflow, and dealership management platforms.
achievements: Led full-stack development using Laravel (backend) and Angular (frontend) for core Techlify products.
Designed REST APIs, implemented domain business logic, and built responsive UI modules and dashboards.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure performance, reliability, and smooth releases.

details: Led Android mobile development for multiple client projects, focusing on performance and maintainable codebases.
achievements: Built and maintained production Android apps and cross-platform apps.
Integrated REST APIs, push notifications, offline caching, and analytics.

details: Delivered custom applications for various clients, handling requirements, development, and deployment end-to-end.
Developed web and mobile solutions for local businesses, focusing on usability and fast delivery.
Built and maintained numerous web and mobile apps, gaining strong foundations in full stack development.
